intro:
The second installment in the 2000s era styled anime-themed Kokoro Clover series!
A visual novel paired with boss battles!
description:
Our heroes' next adventure is in...dinosaur times?! This time the bad guys are trying to destroy the future! The only way to fight back is with dino-transformations!

This installment includes:
- 5-minute recap of the story so far
- Special feature episodes 1-4

◆Visual Novel (Story)◆
In an effort to save a mysterious dinosaur that appears before them, Treffy and her friends travel back in time to the age of dinosaurs! There they encounter a madman bent on destroying the very future they came from!

Set following the events of Season 1, this title acts as a theatrical release for an anime might.

◆Boss Battles◆
2D action designed to be playable by all.

-Gain invincibility by dancing!

◆Series Overview◆
A visual novel series designed to remind players of the joys of Saturday morning cartoons.
Packed with transformations, cards, dancing, and robots, too! The adventure goes on—forever and always!

-Story features opening, ending, and commercial interlude animations!
This installment also features an all-in-one theatrical release mode.

-The clock on the top left can be changed to 8:00, 9:00, or whatever time you wish!

-Features all original music tracks!

-Pixel art visuals serve to offer real 2000s nostalgia."
